def main():
    """Main function"""
    input_string = input()
    print("".join([input_string[i] for i in range(len(input_string)) if input_string[i].isupper()]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

    for i in s:
        print(i[0], end="")
    print()

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    line = line.strip()
    print(line[0], end='')
    for i in range(len(line)):
        if line[i] == "-":
            print(line[i+1], end='')

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


print(input().replace('-', '').replace(' ', ''))

#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

def main():
    n = raw_input()
    n = n.split('-')
    for i in n:
        print(i[0], end="")
    print()

main()


def main():
    name = input()
    print(name[0] + "".join([x[0] for x in name.split(" ")[1:]]).upper())

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

print(input().split('-')[0][0] + ''.join(map(lambda x: x[0], input().split('-')[1:]))[:3])  # noqa

full = input()
print(full[0] + "".join([i[0] for i in full.split("-")[1:]]))
